mapper.sql: select w.documents_id documentsId,w.supplier supplier,w.total_purchase totalPurchase, w.status status,w.applicant applicant,w.warehousing_operator warehousingOperator, w.storage_time storageTime,w.create_time createTime from warehousingaudit_yjd w
mapper.select:
and w.supplier like concat('%',#{supplier},'%')
and w.applicant like concat('%',#{applicant},'%')
and w.status='1'
order by documents_id
mapper.update: update warehousingaudit_yjd set status='2' where documents_id=#{param1}
update warehousingaudit_yjd set status='0' where documents_id=#{param1}
mapper.select: select w.documents_id as drugId, dmp.maintenance_name as drugName, dwr.numbers as `wholesaleNumber`, dmp.prescription_price as `wholesalePrice`, dwr.numbers*dmp.prescription_price as `wholesaleTotalPrice`, w.documents_id as `wholesaleNo`, dmp.`maintenance_num` as maintenanceNum, dmp.`warning_value` as `warningValue`, w.supplier as `manufacturer`, dmp.`drugtype_id` as drugType, dmp.`prescription_id` as `prescriptionType`, dmp.unit as unit, dmp.`conversion_amount` as `conversionOf` from warehousingaudit_yjd as w join `durg_ware_relations` as dwr on w.documents_id=dwr.documents_id join `druginformation_maintenance`as dmp on dwr.`manufacturer_num`=dmp.`maintenance_num`
